# ü§ç Press `donate` to pay respects

If you'd like to support me or my non-commercial projects and educational endeavors, you can do so here. Your generosity **truly ignites my passion** and fuels my dedication to creating amazing content, enhancing features, squashing bugs, and empowering others to reach their full potential ü§ò. Every contribution is a reminder that our collective efforts make a difference!


If you've donated, contact me on [Telegram](https://t.me/dev_native_ir) or [Whatsup](https://wa.me/+989377729207) ‚Äî I'd like to personally thank you. Additionally, if you feel like it, I can add your name, link to your personal profile, a message or the name of the project you're donating for to the list of [supporters below](#paid-respects-).
